mapper.select: select id as "id", username as "username", password as "password", create_datetime as "createDatetime" from users m where m.username = #{username} and m.password = #{password}

SELECT m.path AS "ids" FROM users u INNER JOIN users_role ur ON u.id = ur.users_id INNER JOIN role_permission rp ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id INNER JOIN menu m ON m.id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.id = #{id}
